tooltip.relics.minotaur_hoof.ability.mom: While running, gradually increases movement speed by %1$s%% over 3 seconds until maximum speed is reached. At maximum speed, the player takes %2$s%% reduced damage, pushes away enemies, and deals %3$s damage to all enemies in their path.
tooltip.relics.minotaur_hoof.leveling_so: This relic receives 1 experience point for every mob hit by the ability
